title.native: 転生王女と天才令嬢の魔法革命
title.romaji: Tensei Oujo to Tensai Reijou no Mahou Kakumei
title.english: The Magical Revolution of the Reincarnated Princess and the Genius Young Lady

description:
Despite her supposed ineptitude with regular magic, Princess Anisphia defies the aristocracy’s expectations by developing “magicology,” a unique magical theory based on memories from her past life. One day, she witnesses the brilliant noblewoman Euphyllia unjustly stripped of her title as the kingdom’s next monarch. That’s when Anisphia concocts a plan to help Euphyllia regain her good name-which somehow involves them living together and researching magic! Little do these two ladies know, however, that their chance encounter will alter not only their own futures, but those of the kingdom...and the entire world!

(Source: Yen Press)
synonyms: 轉生公主與天才千金的魔法革命
Revolusi Sihir Sang Putri Reinkarnasi dan Tuan Putri Genius
การปฏิวัติเวทมนตร์ขององค์หญิงเกิดใหม่กับยัยคุณหนูยอดอัจฉริยะ
Магическая революция перерождённой принцессы и гениальной дочери благородного дома

tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Religion
tags.description: Centers on the belief that humanity is related to supernatural, transcendental, and spiritual elements.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Drugs
tags.description: Prominently features the usage of drugs such as opioids, stimulants, hallucinogens etc.

node.description: Since around 2012, Shingo Tamaki has been actively involved in [diomedéa](https://anilist.co/studio/51/diomeda) productions.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/watariwataru)

Wataru is a light novel writer who is best known for being the author of [Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru.](https://anilist.co/manga/70171/Yahari-Ore-no-Seishun-Love-Comedy-wa-Machigatteiru/) In March of 2009, he graduated from Meiji University in Communication and Information.

He initially decided to become a light novel writer because he was having difficulty finding a job. He is currently working at a company as a salaryman while being a part-time writer, with no plans of making writing his full-time occupation.

YouTube | Twitter | Niconico (JP) | Instagram Introduction Hanatan, or alternatively known as YURiCa and KOHANA is a utaite who is known for her beautiful voice with amazing vocal range and vibrato. She often covers duets with Pokota, and cover songs for Kikuo. Biography Hanatan is known for her ability, versatility, and portrayal of emotions. From candy pop to hard rock, ballads to dance remixes, Hanatan does not shy away from any type of song and varies her voice accordingly. For example, in her version of "Jishou Mushoku", she sings in a very high and careful voice, yet in her cover of "Ao", she sings in a rock style with a plethora of strength. Her most viewed cover is "Romeo and Cinderella", with over 11 million combined views (YouTube + NicoNico), as of the 8th of October 2019. Hanatan has released several collaboration albums with various producers through her time, some of them are released under the alias YURiCa (ユリカ), while also releasing other singles for games, Touhou arrangements, and other VOCALOID composers. She has also collaborated with Wotamin, Prico, ChouCho and Korosuke to provide vocals for DANCEROID covers. She also sang several openings of visual novels. Affiliations - Member of Cordelia (Doujin circle) - Member of MyEuphoric (Doujin circle) - Member of Jealousy project (Source: utaite.fandom.com)

__Height:__ 158 cm
__Hobbies & Skills:__ reading, strolling, tuba

[Profile](https://www.raccoon-dog.co.jp/talent/r10-iwami.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/_manaka_430) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%9F%B3%E8%A6%8B%E8%88%9E%E8%8F%9C%E9%A6%99)

Married voice actor [Tasuku Hatanaka](https://anilist.co/staff/107018) in 2020.

__Non-anime roles:__
- Eunhwa - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Ether - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Belle - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/magicmagico) He joined Okayasu Promotion after graduating and studied there as editor, he collected experience on tv animation and drama and gave his debut on Ninja Hattori. He is currently working for 1000 Yamakoshi. Not to be confused with the other Toshihiko Kojima whose name is written with different Kanji.
Tsutomu Miyazawa is an animator, storyboard artist, character and mechanical designer formerly affiliated with [Studio Kikan](https://anilist.co/studio/256/).

__Graduated:__ Kunitachi College of Music (Department of Composition)

__[Profile (Miracle Bus Corp.)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/moehyuga)__

__Introduction:__
Moe Hyuuga is a Japanese composer and arranger, who is affiiliated with the Miracle Bus Corporation. 

__Biography:__
She started learning the piano as early as the age of two. Moe also aspired to be a composer, while being able to play music at an early age. In her current state of affairs, she mainly composes and arranges visual type music such as commercials, dramas and animation.

He initially decided to become a light novel writer because he was having difficulty finding a job. He is currently working at a company as a salaryman while being a part-time writer, with no plans of making writing his full-time occupation.
